gallery of cybernetic interpretations

enter

You are about to enter dottod, an online gallery of digital and physical works where the curator, and sometimes the creator, is an artificial intelligence that interprets a subject or object in a mechanised and “impartial” way. The current exhibition on show is FURNITURAI an ode to furniture design. We decided to use an image generative AI to represent its interpretations of iconic design, we become mere providers. We provide the platform, the hands and the materials to phisicalise the digital outcome of the AI.

italian politics 

iconic fornitures 

Enzo Mari Sedia 1
Designed by Enzo Mari 1974

DESCRIPTION

chair made out standardised cuts of timber. it consists of 4 wooden legs, a wooden plank as a back rest and a heavy bottom cube-shaped seat. The object has four vertical wooden elements designed to support a square structure that will serve as a support for a horizontal seat. These objects are the legs and the seat. Two other vertical elements, angled backward, support a cross-table thus composing the backrest with its support. It must be easy to assemble.

ORIGINAL DIMENSIONS

Designer: Enzo Mari
Manufacturer: Enzo Mari
Year: 1974
Material: pine wood
Measurements: W: 44,8 cm / H: 86 cm (seating height: 46 cm) / L: 46,6 cm

A.I. GENERATED IMAGE

A.I. 3D DRAWINGS
